common.name: Name

noEmployee.description: You need an employee profile to ${feature}. Please create an organization or contact your administrator.
noEmployee.emailBody: Hi,nnI need an employee profile set up to access the platform features. Could you please assist me with this?nnThank you!
noEmployee.helpText: If you were invited to an organization, ask your administrator to set up your employee profile.
noEmployee.title: Employee Profile Required

noOrganization.description: You're not part of any organization yet. Create one to get started or wait for an invitation.
noOrganization.title: No Organization Found
noOrganization.waitingDesc: Your administrator will send you an invitation email. Check your inbox and spam folder.

sidebar.title: Navigation
sidebar.description: This is your main navigation. Access all features from here — time tracking, calendar, absences, and more.

dashboard.title: Dashboard Widgets
dashboard.description: Your personalized dashboard. Drag and drop widgets to rearrange them, and toggle visibility to focus on what matters most.

timeClock.title: Time Clock
timeClock.description: Clock in and out with a single click. Your current work session and today’s total hours are shown here.

timeTracking.title: Time Tracking
timeTracking.description: View and manage your time entries. Add manual entries, edit existing ones, and see your daily and weekly totals.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.description: See your work schedule, absences, and team events at a glance in the calendar view.

absences.title: Absences
absences.description: View your absence history, check remaining vacation days, and track pending requests.

requestAbsence.title: Request Absence
requestAbsence.description: Quickly request time off — vacation, sick leave, or other absence types. Your manager will be notified automatically.

reports.title: Reports
reports.description: Generate reports for your working hours, overtime, and absences. Export data for your records.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay up to date with approval updates, team changes, and important reminders.

teamSection.title: Team Management
teamSection.description: As a manager, oversee your team’s schedules, time entries, and attendance from this section.

approvals.title: Approvals
approvals.description: Review and approve absence requests, time corrections, and other pending items from your team.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure organization settings, manage holidays, set up work schedules, and customize your workspace.

table.description: Showing total visitors for the last 6 months. This is just some random text to test the layout. It spans multiple lines and should wrap around.
table.showing-visitors: Showing total visitors for the last 6 months
